a1: Who is their most expensive player at the moment?
q2: They bought Coutinho in January for £105 million.
a2: That's true, it was a good purchase
q3: Barcelona will win the El Classico without Ronaldo
a3: Probably, but not because of Ronaldo leaving Madrid.
q4: Why did Barcelona sell Yeri Mina?
a4: the player was not ready to contribute at one of the biggest clubs in the world, even though his potential is still there at just 23 years old
q5: Who is the underrated player of the Barcelona team?
a5: Jordi Alba is probably the most underrated player on the team.
